verses.text: \w A|strong="H5921"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* Lord ruleth \w me|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H1732"\w* want nothing.

\w He|strong="H0410"\w* hath set \w me|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H4100"\w* place \w of|strong="H1697"\w* pasture. \w He|strong="H0410"\w* hath brought \w me|strong="H1697"\w* up, \w on|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* water \w of|strong="H1697"\w* refreshment:

\w He|strong="H0430"\w* hath converted \w my|strong="H3808"\w* soul. \w He|strong="H0430"\w* hath led \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* paths \w of|strong="H0430"\w* justice, \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* own nameâ€™s sake.

\w For|strong="H3427"\w* though \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w should|strong="H3478"\w* walk \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H3427"\w* death, \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* fear no evils, \w for|strong="H3427"\w* thou art \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w me|strong="H0859"\w*. Thy rod \w and|strong="H3478"\w* thy staff, \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* comforted \w me|strong="H0859"\w*.

Thou hast prepared a table before \w me|strong="H0982"\w* against \w them|strong="H0001"\w* \w that|strong="H0001"\w* afflict \w me|strong="H0982"\w*. Thou hast anointed \w my|strong="H0982"\w* head \w with|strong="H0001"\w* oil; \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w my|strong="H0982"\w* chalice which inebriateth \w me|strong="H0982"\w*, how goodly \w is|strong="H0001"\w* it!

\w And|strong="H0954"\w* thy mercy \w will|strong="H3808"\w* follow \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H0954"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* days \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* life. \w And|strong="H0954"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* house \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* Lord unto length \w of|strong="H3808"\w* days.
